abstract: Daybees lets people fine-tune searches for things to do, using keywords, location or time and date.
snippet: Daybees lets people fine-tune searches for things to do, using keywords, location or time and date.
lead_paragraph: Staying around town over the weekend and your dinner plans have fallen through? Turning to the printed page might not turn up many attractive alternatives, unless you live in a big city like New York, London or Paris and have access to magazines like Time Out or Pariscope. A Google search could present the opposite problem: too many events in too many places at too many times.

headline.main: Seeking to Outdo Google in Searching for Events
headline.print_headline:
Seeking to Outdo Google
In Searching for Events
